subject: From:
body:
From: 
gloriaro@consultant.com
 <gloriaro@consultant.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019  
To:  
Subject: Re: (US $ 2,800,000.00)
 
Hello  ,
 
I sent a mail to you last week regarding the assigned Compensation Funds (US$2,800,000.00), I needed a reply from that message but you did not so I decided to send a reminder. So before submitting payment details, please Madam, send me the following below to enable me continue with the next step:
 
(1) Your name in full,
(2) your contact address,
(3) your city,
(4) Direct telephone line (cell and land line)
 
I await your response today and attached is my ID.
 
Yours sincerely,
Mrs. Gloria Rochi

subject: Re:   From:
body:
Dear Mrs. Gloria Rochi,

I'm sorry for the delay in response. Here are the details you requested:

Full Name: Eliza Dane
Contact Address: 1234 Main Street, Sydney, Australia
City: Sydney
Direct Telephone Line: +61 2 9876 5432

Please let me know what the next steps are.

Best wishes,
Maria
